1.Title: Flash Engraving
1.Description: When a squad member's HP is greater than or equal to 50%, they take <color=#2BAD00>7.5%</color> less DMG, and <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> less Miasma Contamination. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.

2.Title: Flash Engraving
2.Description: When a squad member's HP is greater than or equal to 50%, they take <color=#2BAD00>8.6%</color> less DMG, and <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> less Miasma Contamination. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.

3.Title: Flash Engraving
3.Description: When a squad member's HP is greater than or equal to 50%, they take <color=#2BAD00>9.7%</color> less DMG, and <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> less Miasma Contamination. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.

4.Title: Flash Engraving
4.Description: When a squad member's HP is greater than or equal to 50%, they take <color=#2BAD00>10.8%</color> less DMG, and <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> less Miasma Contamination. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.

5.Title: Flash Engraving
5.Description: When a squad member's HP is greater than or equal to 50%, they take <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> less DMG, and <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> less Miasma Contamination. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.
